text: I was indeed. Its going to be a huge help to me. I was going in a bit blind originally and trying to figure things out my self so the discovery kit will really come in handy :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi I’m a front-end dev at an agency, and we’re about to add HubSpot CMS to our arsenal. I just test drove the sandbox CMS.
Woot Woot! - Welcome to the community <@UDEASNWEB>. We're excited to have you.
What were your thoughts after test driving? What did you think of the Discovery Kit + Sandbox?
LOL i’ll have some stuff for you soon. Overall, I think it’s going to serve its purpose well.
brilliant - let us know if you have any specific questions. This slack will be an awesome place to ask questions, collaborate and have some fun. Talk soon!
